website_summaries.verdict: A good value for the price, this model offers quality and a modern look.
pros: Users report this model provides fast, even cooking and is easy to clean
We love its high end look and stylish appeal
A good value for the cost with features like the 5-burner range
cons: User issues include occasional problems with the temperature controls
A few reports of trouble with the self-cleaning feature, and minor cosmetic damage

customer_reviews.title: ALL but one of the knobs failed in the last 3 months, otherwise a great stove
customer_reviews.text: I am certain there will be a lawsuit as this is something so many people have reported this. Replacement knobs are not cheap. Obviously, this is a materials issue, the plastic insert was bound to fail. I will join any class action lawsuit.
customer_reviews.author: velzygirl

customer_reviews.title: I am cooking much better now that I have the convection oven and gas
customer_reviews.text: Loving this stove! I am cooking much better now that I have the convection oven and gas.
customer_reviews.author: A Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: Samsung nx58 ss gas range
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Got rid of fridgidair elec. Only complaint is all the favorite settings are pretty much useless because they do not run on convection. Convection is all we use cooks much faster and even.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie S.

customer_reviews.title: But overall she is very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: So far my wife loves this stove. There was one thing that she baked that she said didn't come out as expected. But overall she is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: dwkerux

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great range but beware who you buy it from
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product....exceeded my expectation
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung NX58H5600SS far exceeded my expectations. The look and function of the convection free standing stove provides me with multiple professional cooking options. This stove went into our terrace level kitchen, we have a high end Jenn -Air in the main kitchen and the NX58H5600SS matches its function at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: all was good, showed up on time, was in excellent condition, and am very happy with this unit
customer_reviews.author: darrel peterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all of my baking and cooking! Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My old range died right before Thanksgiving. NOOOOOOO!!! Lots of research later, I purchased this one! I'm all about baking and this bad boy has had LOTS of action since Thanksgiving! This is my first convection oven and while I wasn't sure I needed/wanted it, it has been awesome! The oven is huge, the griddle works great, the entire appliance is easy to clean, and it cooks/bakes really well!
customer_reviews.author: Heddy J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy had it on sale and now we know ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven 8-31-17 and the control panel is broken-----------less than 1 year! DO NOT BUY. Best Buy had it on sale and now we know why----they were just trying to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA HOUSTON

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty but garbage range
customer_reviews.text: The range looks beautiful but that is the only nice thing. The components they use are very cheap and something as simple as the clock doesn't even last 5 years. They have terrible customer service. There are many better options out there.
customer_reviews.author: BPink

customer_reviews.title: No customer support from this Korean appliance company.
customer_reviews.text: They refuse to honor their warranty. Samsung is known for horrible customer support. Phones are good but this is one Korean appliance company to be avoided. Good thing they are forced to pay higher tariffs now to sell to the USA. Be smart, buy American instead. You will have less headaches.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Poor warranty, expensive replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: The self-cleaning feature was used once--and it blew out the electronics on the control panel. Technician told us to never use the self-cleaning feature again. Notice the enamel on the bottom was peeling and the center burner was stained and it cannot be leaned. Both are not covered on my extended warranty--only items that inhibit oven from working. And to replace the one burner--$125!! We will shop for a new oven--and NOT a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Roger H. Soiset

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it will break for $1,000 you get an oven that won't work past a year.
customer_reviews.text: You ar correct, a Samsung range will break. Do not buy. It will lose more and more temp while cooking, in just a few months you'll wonder why the cookies aren't done. Then it will start taking longer to light. Now, regardless of when you call, Samsung will blame this on your gas line having too much pressure. They will charge you and end up concluding it is your gas line. Google it. Look it up. Hundreds have this problem. A class action lawsuit is being investigated. Check it out for yourself, don't have to take my word for it. This oven is garbage, and a waste of almost $1,000!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Defective Digital Touchpad - Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The digital touchpad stopped working just over a year in rendering the oven useless. Awful customer service. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Hecht

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stove... Cook pretty well... When it turns on :(
customer_reviews.text: Pretty stove, cooks/bakes like a gas range should... Then 2 months out of warranty and lost all power. Called customer service, who walked me through making sure the plug was plugged in and there was power to the outlet. They verified we were out of warranty and offered to connect me with a repair service who would call me back within 48 hours. They will also need to look at the knob that never quite worked for the front left burner :(
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges can cut you on back side of stove
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this stove for my wife and ended up with a nasty cut on my hand that and a trip to urgent care. On the back side of the oven near the top are a series of vents in the sheet metal backing. The edges of these vents are very sharp. In my case I was moving behind the the range finishing up the gas line and slid my hand across the vents and that's how I got the cut. These sharp sheet metal edges are easy to hurt yourself on.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM D EMELANDER

customer_reviews.title: Amazon refused to post my review of Samsung's warranty service
customer_reviews.text: Amazon refused to post my review of Samsung's warranty service
customer_reviews.author: Egerio

customer_reviews.title: knobs brake
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my stove rang in 2016 and all the knobs have broken since. They are made of cheap plastic. other than having to replace all the knobs every 2 years the stove works fine. Samsung will not pay for the cost outside of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The finish is coming off, the gas knobs have all broken. Less than 2 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: G. Card

customer_reviews.title: Display shorted out
customer_reviews.text: Woke up this morning to snapping sound and no digital display, then heard electric arcing sound with smell of electricity in air. Stove just over a year old🙄
customer_reviews.author: Ztigr

product_meta.title: Samsung NX58H5600SS 30 In. Freestanding Gas Range with Custom Griddle and 5.8 Cu. Ft. Convection Oven, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Samsung NX58H5600SS 30 In. Freestanding Gas Range with Custom Griddle and 5.8 Cu. Ft. Convection Oven, in stainless steel, combines the power of a gas-powered cooktop with the speed of a convection oven. Five gas burners range from 5,000 BTUs to 17,000 BTUs and include a large, oval-shaped center burner perfect for casseroles and other large dishes. Three cast iron grates lift easily from the cooktop surface to facilitate quick cleaning in case of spills and boil overs. The convection fan system is great for baking and broiling because heat is distributed thoroughly and food cooks evenly. Plus, this range comes with a custom-griddle designed to fit perfectly over the center burners so you can cook a variety of delicious foods at once.
feature_bullets: 5 gas cooktop burners including 17K BTU power burner and 5K BTU simmer burner
Cast iron 3-piece grates, plus custom griddle for center burner
Large 5.8 cu. ft. capacity convection oven with 2 chrome racks
Oven features: delay start, proofing, 4 presets, auto shut-off, sabbath mode, self-clean, auto light

specifications.Manufacturer Warranty: 1 year parts and labor, 5 years gas cooktop
specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.3 out of 5 stars41 ratings2.3 out of 5 stars
